EmailTemplate.description: Sends when a student 'Stage' = "Enrolled" or "A/ Deposit" & 'Attending School?' = "Yes" and the related student academic file doesn't link back to the opportunity that triggers the workflow
EmailTemplate.name: Sys/Adm - Inform of Enrolled Student without Academic File
EmailTemplate.subject: Student {!Opportunity.Name} is Enrolled but has no Academic File
